name: REAL 8 BALL POOL SNOOKER
description:
Ready to become expert in billiard? Step to play Real 8 ball pool snooker for your expertise in the world’s famous game.
The Super billiard game is collection of 8 balls over different pools with number of sticks and players. The game is grouped by variety of levels from easy to difficult. Technically adjusted levels of 8 ball Pool Xtrem possess three modes of play like Practice, Arcade and Two Players.
Ball Pool Snooker 2017 synthesizing the climate of club at your iphone with digital game application. Definitely promoting the sense of real Pool game, making you skillful of snooker challenge with customized levels in Xtrem 3D quality.
The real ball pool is constituted to develop the Strong competitive touch, take challenge of Pool tournament filled up with contestant contribution like 1 VS 1, beat your partner and noticed.
The awesome 8 Pool ball game is characterized with all important elements of actual real Snooker game. Multiple rotational camera conveniently creates the total view of table and strengthening the possibility of strike the ball from all sides of table.
This game completely furnished with fun, beautiful colors, astonishing colliding sound and all attention attaining components.
Interconnected levels conditionally open with the success of previous level.

Features:
• Stunning 3D graphic animation
• Interconnected games level
• Stimulating playing modes; i.e. Arcade, Practice, Two players
• Excellent Competitive environment
• Real life experience of Billiard
• Magnificent customized cue and Pool function
• Striking sound and definite coloring touch

How to play:
Practice Mode:
Practice mode play and prepare yourself for the real match pot all the balls and remember the rules.
2) Arcade Mode (New and no rules)
You need to pocket all the balls on the table. There are 8 levels in Arcade Mode.
3) VS Mode: Player vs.Player (with rules)
Play against the computer Player with standard 8 ball rules or 9 ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike
